Title: Citizens of Dalaran
Description:
Our citizens must be prepared for Dalaran's departure. Can you ask around the city and see if anyone requires aid?

I'd also like for you to speak with Brann and Archmage Drenden. They both had concerns that would be best to address before we depart for Khaz Algar.
ObjectivesText: Help the citizens of Dalaran prepare for the teleportation.
CompletionText: Dalaran is always ready to defend the world, but that doesn't mean we can do so on a whim. Preparations are key to a smooth transportation.
RewardText: Thank you for your help. It's important that the citizens of Dalaran are ready for whatever may come.
